sentences.en: Combat Prescience. You gain a + 2 insight bonus on your attack roll.
sentences.cn: 战斗远见: 你的攻击掷骰得到+2洞察加值.

sentences.en: Darwin's intellect, humility ("It is always advisable to perceive clearly our ignorance") and prescience astonish more as scientists clarify, in detail he never imagined, how much he got right.
sentences.cn: 在科学家们弄清楚他从未在细节上作过设想，他对了多少的时候，达尔文的睿智，谦逊（这对我们觉醒自己的无知很可取）和预见使我们更惊讶。

sentences.en: Her Majesty's question has sparked a series of ludicrous claims about the prescience of individual forecasters.
sentences.cn: 女王的问题激起一片可笑的声言,纷纷宣称某某预测师有先见之明.

sentences.en: Muhammad also told his followers to pray facing Jerusalem. He said God, in his "prescience," chose "the children of Israel ... above all peoples.
sentences.cn: 穆罕默德还告诉他的信徒要面向耶路撒冷祈祷，他在“预知”中称主选择“以色列的子民为万民之首。”

sentences.en: Over the years he's demonstrated a certain prescience in foreign affairs.
sentences.cn: 这些年来，他已经在外交事务方面表现出一定的预见性。

sentences.en: Soviet leader of proven shrewdness and prescience ( Joyce carol Oates ) See Usage Note at prove.
sentences.cn: 一位被公认为精明而有预见力的苏联领导人 ( 乔伊丝·卡罗尔·奥茨 ) 参见.

sentences.en: Stay one step ahead of change: One of the factors that fueled Welch's success was his prescience.
sentences.cn: 提前做好变革的准备： 韦尔奇的预见能力是助他成功的一项要素。

sentences.en: Still he had a strange prescience , an intimation of something yet to come.
sentences.cn: 不过他有一种奇特的预感, 感到了某件事情就要发生!

sentences.en: That lack of prescience is hurting.
sentences.cn: 缺乏先见之明，带来的是伤害。

sentences.en: This is nothing new.We have never been good at foretelling the future, but when the news isfavorable, others forgive our lack of prescience.
sentences.cn: 像以往一样，我们从来不擅长对未来的预测，但是当都是好消息的时候，别人总是原谅我们缺乏预知。
